Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at South Shore/81st
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 71 71st/South Shore buses temp rrtd via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange, 79th & South Shore, due to street blockage near South Shore/81st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange, 79th, then resume their normal routes on South Shore, due to street blockage near South Shore/81st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
